0011000011100110 0010000101000100 0 -> sum: 0101001000101010, cout: 0
0100011010100011 0010011110010010 0 -> sum: 0110111000110101, cout: 0
1111101101111001 0011110111100110 0 -> sum: 0011100101011111, cout: 1
0010001000010001 1000111000100110 0 -> sum: 1011000000110111, cout: 0
1010000010010000 0110101100110010 0 -> sum: 0000101111000010, cout: 1
1000001001101010 1111011001111010 1 -> sum: 0111100011100101, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
